name: Power Wash Cleaning Simulator
description:
Are you ready for relaxing powerful washing game experience!
Get this amazing powers washing game & become pressure washer for cleaning dirt from of house, cars, bikes or any junkyard in this pressure wash simulator. Wipe out all dirt from the home and your vehicle. Use your washing gun and start power washing now.
Being a power washer you have to get contracts of different homes and vehicles.

Powerful wash simulator have different power washer water guns & pressure washing nozzles for washing self satisfaction and wipe out all the corners of the home. So explore the house wash for a relaxing and satisfying anti stress experience of house dirt cleaning.

Use the hint eye button to glow the dirt area then start washing of home with power washer water guns. Wipe out all muddy things in power washer simulator & enjoy it.

-You have multiple home objects to pressure wash.
- All dirty vehicles like cars, van and bike available for power wash.
- Wash out pools, garage and other house parts.
- Wipe out dirt from beautiful paintings.
-You have multiple nozles and guns to use.
